profileId.description: The Campaign Manager 360 user profile ID.

synchronous.description: If set and true, tries to run the report synchronously.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

$block: Represents a File resource. A file contains the metadata for a report run. It shows the status of the run and holds the URLs to the generated report data if the run is finished and the status is "REPORT_AVAILABLE".

$ul: **kind**: The kind of resource this is, in this case dfareporting#dateRange.
**relativeDateRange**: The date range relative to the date of when the report is run.
**format**: The output format of the report. Only available once the file is available.
**id**: The unique ID of this report file.
**kind**: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "dfareporting#file".
**lastModifiedTime**: The timestamp in milliseconds since epoch when this file was last modified.
**reportId**: The ID of the report this file was generated from.
**status**: The status of the report file.
**urls**: The URLs where the completed report file can be downloaded.
**apiUrl**: The URL for downloading the report data through the API.
**browserUrl**: The URL for downloading the report data through a browser.
